title: qxvpeu
Description: Unfortunately tragedy of Ashling Murphy’s fatal assault seems far too close to home for many of us.Only last year I was contacted by a woman on Twitter to let me know that a man (who is still out on bail on sexual harassment and offensive sexual conduct charges) was following me and hundreds of other women on strava, following our location and taking hundreds of thousands of images of women without their consent (The Irish Times said he had 250k images).I am not prepared to give up doing what I love so the sacrifice, as things stand in society currently, is accepting that these disgusting stories are the norm for women. We desperately need this to change.I’ve decided to run the Paris Marathon in April 2022 for the Dublin Rape Crisis Centre, whose work helps not only to comfort those in the aftermath of sexual violence but also helps prevent these attacks from happening in the first place. This is what we need - efforts to now catch the attacker, who has brutally stolen the life of a beautiful and intelligent young woman too early, are too little too late.The demand for their services is currently so high that they require €41,000 every week to maintain services and programmes at their present level.Do you want to join me in making a difference? Every donation will help. Thank you in advance for your contribution to this cause that means so much to me.Read more

title: big sweet duke needs two new hips
Description: Duke was getting ready to come to Canine Humane Network Maryland from Drowzydawg Rescue in Texas when we discovered that he needs a double hip replacement.Duke is an amazing and friendly Mastiff/Lab mix. He is about one year old and weighs over 100 lbs. He has an adopter lined up already and will be serving as an emotional support dog. We found out at his neuter appointment that he has severe hip dysplasia. This is a future death sentence on a dog of his size, and he eventually will not be able to walk. He needs a double hip replacement that will cost upwards of $18,000.If we can raise the money for Duke's surgery, he will live a full and happy life serving as an emotional support dog for a wonderful adopter. Please consider helping us save this sweet boy by making a tax deductible donation today!Read more

title: garrets promise at spirits promise
Description: As you know Garret passed away tragically on May 1st, 2021. Since then, we have been trying to figure out how we can allow his memory to live on forever. After researching different charities and considering a football scholarship in his honor, nothing felt quite right.Garret's passing has led us to a sanctuary of healing. Through group therapy, one on one counseling, volunteer work, and time at the farm, Spirit’s Promise has given us a second chance at life. We have smiled through times we only imagined would bring sadness, and found spiritual connections during times of utter despair. Spirit’s Promise has given us HOPE. We want to help give others a chance at restoring their lives the way Spirit’s Promise has been helping us to restore ours.When working with the family of Spirit's Promise, we realized there is a real opportunity to help, a real need that needs to be fulfilled. What has since developed is Garret's Promise. Garret's Promise is our commitment to the word promise. It's our promise to help autistic children, people in turmoil, people in grievance, and people who need hope. It's our promise to anyone who needs this promise in their lives, that we will be here to help them, and all in Garret's honor.Currently Spirit’s Promise operates strictly outdoors, limiting their scope of practice. Garret’s Promise, will bring an indoor round pen to the farm and will change the trajectory of how people experience Spirit’s Promise. This indoor sanctuary of healing will allow Spirit's Promise to help people no matter the time of year or the time of day. Rain or shine, day or night, Spirit’s Promise will be able to host community events, offer therapeutic programming, and bring love to those who feel unlovable.If you are so inclined, please help bring Garret's Promise to life. We hope you can become a part of our hope.Read more

title: trans lifeline for the gyst challenge
Description: Want to join me in making a difference? Did you know that, according to a survey, 52% of all transgender and nonbinary young people in the U.S. seriously contemplated killing themselves in 2020? Trans Lifeline is a national trans-led organization dedicated to improving the quality of trans lives by responding to the critical needs of our community with direct service, material support, advocacy, and education. Our vision is to fight the epidemic of trans suicide and improve overall life-outcomes of trans people by facilitating justice-oriented, collective community aid.Read more

title: keeponshiningky
Description: On the night of Friday, 12/10, and early Saturday, 12/11, a series of tornadoes tore through Western Kentucky, leaving a path of destruction across the whole region and taking the lives--at current estimate--of 74 people, including 12 children. From Mayfield to Bowling Green, Dawson Springs to Bremen, the damage to families, businesses, and infrastructure was staggering. It has been called the costliest tornado event in U.S. history. More than 1,000 homes and businesses were lost; many more damaged--and families throughout the region enter this holiday season waiting for their power to be restored.But this has also been a story of resilience for the Bluegrass State, of neighbors helping neighbors, and of the people of Western Kentucky putting one step after another and getting about the business of rebuilding their lives. Kentuckians have come together across any and all differences and have been joined by friends, neighbors, and strangers from around the country, and around the world--living up to the state's motto of "United We Stand, Divided We Fall."We ask you to join in that effort--to help Kentuckians in their efforts to get their power, their infrastructure, and their lives restored, and to forge ahead in their process of rebuilding their homes, their businesses, their towns, and their lives. The strength, regenerative spirit, and resolve of Kentuckians has been a light in this darkness. To paraphrase Western Kentucky musical pioneer and "The Father of Bluegrass Music" Bill Monroe's "Blue Moon of Kentucky," we would like your help as Kentucky keeps that light shining. Let's Keep on Shining, Kentucky.#KeepOnShiningKYThese funds are being raised for the Central Region Innovation and Commercialization Center in Kentucky, a 501(c)(3) located in the Western Kentucky University Center for Research & Development in Bowling Green, Kentucky, whose mission is to facilitate the creation, growth, recruitment, and retention of jobs based in this region. The CRICC knows that helping the towns and families impacted by this tragedy will be vital to that mission. The CRICC will distribute 100% of funds collected to multiple locally based efforts throughout Western Kentucky in the towns and rural areas directly affected by the tornadoes. This page was set up by Sam Ford, a fellow at the CRICC and Bowling Green resident. More about the CRICC here: https://centralregionicc.com.Read more

title: honoring jarvis jay masters 60th birthday
Description: Our dear friend Jarvis Jay Masters has been on San Quentin's Death Row for 31 years for a crime he did not commit. He will be turning 60 on February 24, 2022. To honor his 60th birthday with a surprise (Shhh!),  we are fundraising $5,000 to pay for social media ads to AMPLIFY his exoneration campaign with major video ad pieces that will be donated pro bono by a leading creative studio. 2022 is a PIVOTAL year as his legal case winds its way through the federal courts, thanks to a dedicated pro bono legal team. NOW IS THE TIME TO EXPAND REACH TO LAWMAKERS, MEDIA, and the PUBLIC.Funds are being collected and disbursed by the Clear View Project, a Berkeley-based nonprofit that has supported Jarvis for many years. Join us!For more background info: Campaign to Exonerate Jarvis Jay Masters and Clear View ProjectMay all beings benefit!In Gratitude and Solidarity!-CEJJM & CVPRead more

Description: कास्की जिल्ला साबिक घाचोक गा।बि।स।हाल माछापुच्छ«े गाउँपालिका स्थायी घर भई पोखरा महानगरपालिका बसोबास गर्ने हाल भर्जिनिया निवासी  नेपाल कानुन तथा लेखापढी व्यबशायी समितिका निबर्तमान अध्यक्ष,समाज सेवी व्यक्तित्व हाम्रा आदरणी दाजु अनिल कार्की ९अम्बर० लामो समय देखी बिश्वको दुर्लभ,९बिश्व प्रसिद्ध बैज्ञानिक स्टेफन हाकिङ्ग० लाई लागेको९ए।एल।एस।० रोग बाट ग्रस्त भई नेपाल तथा भारत का बिभिन्न अस्पतालहरुमा उपचार गराउदा समेत निको नभएको र सो रोगको अमेरीका को फ्लोरिडा स्थित मायो क्लिनकमा मात्र उपचार हुने भएकोले साथै निजहरुले नेपाल तथा भारतको विभिन्न अस्पतालहरुमा उपचार गराउँदा निकै ठुलो धनराशीको खर्च भएकाले उहाँको जिबनरक्षाको लागी अमेरीका तथा बिश्व भरी रहेका सम्पुर्ण नेपाली हरुको संस्था गैर आवाशीय नेपाली संघ,जनसम्पर्क समिति, प्रबाशी मञ्च,पत्रकार महासंघ,कास्की समाज तथा बिभिन्न समाजिक संघ संस्था मार्फत सम्पुर्ण नेपालीहरुले आफुले सक्दो सहयोग गरी जिबनरक्षा गर्दिनहुनका लागी  बिनम्र अनुरोध गर्दछौ । भबदिय श्रीराम वाग्ले जर्जिया एटलान्टा सम्पर्क १ [phone redacted] बिरामी अम्बर बहादुर कार्की उहाँ की श्रीमती शुष्मा कार्की  सम्पर्क १ [phone redacted]सहयोगी दिपक थापा         सम्पर्क १ [phone redacted] बसन्त कार्की माउन्ट एभरेष्ट टेलिभिजन क्यानाडा १ [phone redacted]Kul Gurung  [phone redacted]Ramesh Shrestha  [phone redacted]Read more

title: lyba and mll support for marshall fire victims
Description: The Louisville Youth Baseball Association and Monarch Little League organizations both share in the heartache felt throughout the 80027 community.We are teaming up to help support over 45 of our current and former youth Baseball and Softball players, Coaches and Leagues. title: 8svfp8 mutual aid fundraiser
Description: Epsilon Chapter of Omega Psi Phi Fraternity Inc.  is holding a Family Aid Fundraiser throughout January to support our struggling neighbors with direct cash assistance. In February 2021, Brothers of Epsilon Chapter, alongside community partners, distributed $4,500 to 9 Black and Brown NYC families, helping to ease their financial burdens. Please support our second annual Fundraiser, as we again assist our fellow New Yorkers in the face of an ongoing pandemic, record inflation, and systemic oppression.All proceeds up to $5,000 will go towards supporting up to 10 families. Any additional funds will be used to support more families, as well as other social action programs. All donations are tax-deductible through partnership with our fiscal sponsor, Invictus Greater New York City Foundation. We also thank our community partners, Nourish NYC and The Garden, for their support.Read more

title: mark baldwin memorial bench
Description: For over four decades, Mark Baldwin worked in service of the Brothertown Indians. He started a contemporary newsletter in the 1980s, spearheaded numerous grants, served on Tribal Council, and volunteered for countless projects. A few years ago, Mark dreamed of building a nonprofit that would preserve and share the history of the Brothertown Indians. Through his work, Calumet & Cross was born. But we lost our beloved friend too soon. Mark passed away suddenly in 2021. His loss has been felt by Brothertown Indians, family, friends, and colleagues in Wisconsin, California, Georgia, Washington, New York, Oregon, Massachusetts, and many more places.One of Mark's last projects with Calumet and Cross was a series of historical markers for culturally important sites in and around Brothertown, Wisconsin, including the Union Cemetery. Union Cemetery is the final resting place for many Brothertown Indians, including some of Mark's relatives. We have chosen to honor Mark’s life by purchasing and installing a memorial bench in Union Cemetery. If you wish to participate, you are welcome to contribute to the memorial bench and/or join us in Wisconsin for the dedication. We hope to dedicate the bench on June 13, 2022, factors permitting.Read more

title: SoBoUnited2022
Description: We live in the vibrant and diverse part of Baltimore between the stadiums on the west and Fort McHenry on the east. Early this year, a few SoBo residents launched the nonprofit South Baltimore United Incto help build stronger community connections among everyone who lives and works here.In our first year, we:launched a free community newspaper, the South Baltimore Peninsula Post, that celebrates where we live with engaging stories about SoBo people and places,hosted free community events like “Chalk It Up SoBo” and the SoBo Scavenger Hunt, andkept the peninsula on top of local news and events week after week with email alerts and posts on Facebook, Instagram, and Twitter.It’s been a busy and exciting 2021 for this young enterprise. We’ve made a lot of new connections and are pumped to hear from so many people who like what we’re doing. And we really appreciate the support of local businesses that advertise in our print edition.As we head into 2022, we need your help to keep these community connections thriving and growing.We are kicking off our first community fundraising campaign this month with a goal to raise $8,000 by January 30.Your donations will give South Baltimore United a solid foundation for another busy year of printing the Peninsula Post newspaper every other month, posting community updates every week, and sponsoring one or more fun community events.You can make a difference to your South Baltimore community by donating today to South Baltimore United, Inc.Read more

title: neglected toby needs an urgent enucleation
Description: Toby was rescued from a kill shelter. He was brought to us sick and neglected with one eye protruding out of its socket. The first thing we had to do was treat his cold and have him see an ophthalmologist in hopes of saving his eye. Unfortunately, the doctors were unable to salvage it. Now, not only is Toby visually impaired, but it also causes extremely high eye pressure and immense discomfort to him. Because of that it became necessary to remove the eye entirely. While he is under anesthesia, we will also neuter him. Would you please help us provide this vital surgery which is the only way to give Toby a pain free life? He needs your support now more than ever!Read more

title: dr kenneth oconnor scholarship fund
Description: Donations to this fund will establish a scholarship to honor the life of Dr. Kenneth O’Connor, who was a professor of chemistry at Marshall University. Dr. O’Connor generously shared his love of science and chemistry with his students at Marshall and with the greater Huntington-Charleston community through his efforts in chemistry magic shows and scout merit badge workshops. Dr. O’Connor was known for his varied collection of chemical demonstrations, which intrigued and inspired many to pursue careers in science and medicine. He regularly donated an enormous amount of his personal time to meet one-on-one with his students in class or with those who wanted career advice in preparation for medical school. Dr. O’Connor was a greatly respected professor, colleague, and friend who possessed a unique ability to make organic chemistry unintimidating and fun. We seek to remember and continue his great legacy through the establishment of this scholarship fund.Read more

title: 8s2nq9 lost everything
Description: Want to join me in making a difference? I'm raising money to benefit ELFA, and any donation will help make an impact. Thanks in advance for your contribution to this cause that means so much to me.On Friday, January 7, 2022, the Alkurdi family came home from having dinner with friends, devastated to find their life savings stolen from their home. The case is under investigation by the local police department.Immediately prior to the burglary, Marwa Alkurdi was in the process of planning a trip with the family, to visit her mother , who is due for open-heart surgery. With the burglary, they lost their social security cards, passports, $40,000 in cash savings, and another, estimated $30,000 in jewelry, not to mention the trauma of losing their sense of security and safety.This campaign is to try and help them recoup a little of the money they lost. At the very least, to allow the family an opportunity to visit Marwa’s mother before her surgery.Background: This young family, originally from Daraa, Syria arrived in Tucson, AZ five years ago, as Syrian refugees from Amman, Jordan. Issa & Marwa Alkurdi hit the ground running, motivated to build a new life through their hard work, for their 4 young daughters. They had left behind family, a home, and a small business—Issa was a shopkeeper who made a living selling fresh vegetables until the Syrian war. Like many others, he was arrested, tortured, and jailed for a few months. Upon his release, the family escaped on foot, and crossed the border into Amman, Jordan. After a few months at the refugee camp, Issa went into the city to find work. He worked odd jobs to survive. Finally, the family applied to the UN for refugee status and their journey brought them to Tucson, Arizona.This family’s work ethic, is what sets them apart. Eager to work and support his family, for the last five years, Issa has worked hard as a dishwasher in a local resort, and was very recently promoted to a chef position there. Marwa needed to stay at home to care for her 4 young children, and even though she struggles with ongoing health issues, she was motivated to find a way to make an income to help her husband, along with her family back home. She had lost 2 brothers in the war, and regularly sends money to support their orphans, along with supporting her mother.Marwa became an at-home baker through Elfa’s*, then-newly launched 	Syrian Sweet Exchange	 program. She worked hard selling her sweet confections through the program, travelling back-and-forth from Tucson to Phoenix, taking any opportunity to support her income. Even recently, she was one of few to volunteer to help support the newly arrived Afghans in Tucson, by catering their meals at highly discounted rates. Over the last 6 years, the family has struggled through many life altering challenges. One of them happened to be a blessing in disguise. Their identities were stolen for a period of three years, and along with that, their tax returns. Recently, the IRS sent them a check, back-paying 3 years’ worth of tax returns. They couldn’t believe this good fortune of unexpected savings of about $30,000. The husband and wife team had dreams of saving further for a down payment for a home—a way out of public housing. Even with this major setback, as is their proven work ethic, they will continue to fight forward for the sake of their family and their survival.*Elfa is a Tucson-based nonprofit organization providing refugees and youth of all backgrounds with resources, workshops, support, and a safe environment to develop healthy habits, find new talents, and gain leadership skills so that they may become independent and successful .Read more

title: 2022 boston marathon team
Description: Help support the Ed Walsh Foundation team running in the 2022 Boston Marathon. Money raised from this event is used to help Boston area children in school and sports.Named for Lieutenant Ed Walsh of the Boston Fire Department, the Ed Walsh Foundation was established to keep Ed’s spirit alive by giving back to the community where he lived and worked.Ed’s life was devoted to serving others and the goal of the Foundation is to carry-on Ed’s dedication to helping people in need. The Foundation’s mission is to help Boston area children and families. In addition to lending a hand to local families coping with tragedy, death, or illness, the Foundation also supports youth sports, after-school programs and organizations like the YMCA, Boys & Girls Club and Franciscan Children’s.The Ed Walsh Foundation also distributes grant money through its Smile-On Grant program. The Smile-On Grant was created to celebrate children and to support the teachers, parents, coaches and therapists who work with them. Our grants provide teachers with the tools and resources they need. This was especially true during the 2020 and 2021 school years as teachers and specialists worked so hard to adapt their programs and put together resources for students to have when learning remotely.The Ed Walsh Foundation is keeping Ed's spirit alive by spreading smiles to children in school and sports. Your support allows us to do that and we are so grateful for your help.With Thanks,Kristen and the entire  Ed Walsh Foundation teamFoundation Facebook PageRead more

title: andy robinsons 80th birthday save the children
Description: Fans of actor Andrew Robinson live all around the world, and bridge multiple generations, as Andy’s career has spanned five decades, from his roles as Scorpio in Dirty Harry, Larry in Hellraiser, fan favourite Garak on Star Trek: Deep Space Nine, as well as countless film, TV, and theatre credits. He also created the MFA Acting program at USC School of Dramatic Arts, and has written two beloved books.In honour of his 80th birthday on February 14th 2022, we’re raising money for a charity he has supported since the 1990s: Save the Children. Especially through his teaching, and the time and love he’s shared with the Sid City Social Club during the pandemic, Andy has shown how much he cares about what he can give to the next generation, and to the world at large. We intend to harness some of the generosity he has shown to his fans over the years, and pay it forward to an important cause.Save the Children USA is a non-profit organisation working to improve the lives of children in the United States and around the globe. They provide life-saving aid and supplies in emergencies, areas of poverty, and in warzones. This includes an ongoing response during the Covid-19 pandemic, providing education and vaccines to badly impacted and undersupported countries. [More info: Save the Children ]Donations to this fundraiser will be given directly to Save the Children via GoFundMe, soon after Andy’s birthday. Andy will be notified via Melissa Lowery of SidCity . If you’d like to contribute to our collective charitable gift, any amount is welcome and appreciated. You can also leave a public message in the comments here after you donate![This fundraiser is run by Amy G and Elmie K-E, members of the Sid City Social Club. Credit to Dr. Una McCormack for the initial idea.]Read more

title: mulcahys vs kilimanjaro

Mount Kilimanjaro is the highest free standing mountain in the world at 19,341 ft and by taking on the challenge we hope to raise as much money as possible for this amazing organization.Pieta House is based in Ireland and provide a professional one-to-one therapeutic service to people who are in suicidal distress, those who engage in self-harm, and those bereaved by suicide. All of their services are provided free of charge and no referral is needed.Thank you for checking this out and please consider a donation.Anthony & Mark MulcahyRead more

title: help to save the windward zero waste hui
Description: The Windward Zero Waste School Hui is a living system that educates students about sustainability at Ka’ohao, Ka’elepulu, Kainalu and Enchanted Lake Elementary schools as well as Kailua Intermediate School. Using hot compost and green waste piles, worms and cardboard and paper management, the Hui has reduced school trash by over 90%. In fact, 57.8 TONS of waste has been diverted from Oahu landfills in 2021, so far. Check out Zero Waste School Hui for stats on food recovery, composting and vermicomposting. Mindy and the team publish daily!This award-winning, nationally-acclaimed zero waste program, a partnership of Windward Oahu schools working cooperatively in the pursuit of waste reduction, soil restoration, and applied environmental education is at risk of shutting down due to a shortage of funding. Our fundraising goal to sustain the program through the end of the 2021-2022 school year is $50,000, which will be used to support the trained staff members who manage all organic processing daily, and educate the next generation ofenvironmental leaders.Over 2,000 students participate every school day, contributing food waste to composting systems which turn the material into rich, organic compost, which is sold to the community with all income going back to participating schools to fund sustainability and education programs.If you would like to donate, please click the Donate Now button, or the donate button at Zero Waste - Donate : this directs donations to O’ahu Resource Conservation and Development Council.If you have a special set of skills or time you’d like to donate to the program, please contact us.The Windward Zero Waste School Hui initiative is a non-profit program of the Oahu ResourceConservation and Development Council , a 501(c)(3) organization. EIN 94-3279682Read more

title: save heart of mary
Description: WELCOME!!! We are so blessed that God has led you here and put it on your heart to hear our story. Supporters of Heart of Mary Catholic School have created this escrow-type fundraiser to preserve our school’s 121-year legacy. Our school faces possible closure at the end of the 2021-2022 school year if we cannot raise $350,000.00 to ensure continued enrollment for the 2022-2023 academic year by the end of February 2022. Therefore, we have designed this fundraiser to be an escrow-type account, meaning that if we do not reach our goal, we will return all funds raised back to our donors.Many of our students are 2nd, 3rd, 4th and even 5th generation Heart of Mary Eagles and Lions. Additionally, our students are not only descendants of Heart of Mary Alumni but embrace the wider Mobile area. Our students come from many communities to experience a Christian-based education with dedicated teachers who teach using a state-of-the-art curriculum specific to their collegiate disciplines. In addition, our teachers invest in an extended relationship with each student through our Learning Communities.Our school holds significant historical value and prominence in the Mobile, AL community and has been soaring and roaring for over 121 years. We must preserve its history and legacy. We ask that you find it in your heart to invest in our children and their education as we continue to move forward.If you would like additional information, find us on the web at: heartofmaryschoolmobile.org or contact Heart of Mary’s school office at (251) [phone redacted], 310 Sengstak Street, Mobile, AL 36603 or Karlos Finley at (251) [phone redacted].PLEASE SHARE!!!Read more

title: tractor needed for large peas animal sanctuary
Description: Pan Equus Animal Sanctuary (www.PEASbarn.org) is a 501(c)3 animal sanctuary located in Oxford, Michigan, providing a safe, loving, caring, lifelong home for abused, neglected, abandoned, and end-of-life farm animals. Along with over 100 large animals, we have a legion of hard-working and dedicated volunteers with no paid employees. Every day the PEAS volunteers medicate, clean, feed and groom our residents, as needed, without exception.Recently our tractor experienced significant mechanical failure and is not reasonably repairable. Without a tractor, PEAS incurs substantial additional work and expense. We are hoping to raise funds to buy a reliable used tractor. A versatile tractor will allow us to handle cost-effective round bales of hay, dig much-needed water lines and electrical trenches, install fencing, pull wagons, move manure and sand, maintain roads and drives, and many other essential farm duties.If you would like to learn more about our mission, please visit us at www.peasbarn.orgThank you and taking the time to learn about PEAS. Your support is humbly appreciated and makes it possible for us to continue helping animals in need and sharing their lives with visitors who come to know and love them.Read more

Description: Hello MYBS families and fans,We hope your new year is off to a great start. title: jamies marathon for the good grief trust
Description: Hi, my name's Jamie, and just over two years ago I tragically lost my best friend, Josh, in an accident in Budapest. Since then, I have struggled to come to terms with my grief as this was such a shocking and sudden loss that nothing could prepare me for it.For those who were lucky to have met Josh, you would know he was the kindest, funniest, and most outrageously stubborn person to grace this earth. He never pretended to be anything he wasn't and therefore had a true sense of character, which he projected onto his friends and family. The care and love he showed to us was immeasurable and always pushed us to achieve the best we could in life. Whether it was music, tennis, cycling, cooking, or drinking, he pushed himself to be the best of his ability, and he always encouraged you to do the same in your life. The warmth and energy he brought to the room will never be matched and there will always be an empty chair in the corner of my eye where he should be sat.Grief can leave you feeling so isolated, like your fighting this battle all alone, and you forget that the simplest solution is to reach out for help. I wish that earlier I had decided to use the services of charities such as The Good Grief Trust because their cause is so important in reminding the hundreds of thousands of us who suffer from grief every day that they are not alone. Bereavement support is out there, and it's paramount that those who need it, like myself, have access to it to avoid further suffering. The Good Grief Trust can provide that. For this reason, I have decided that I will run the Edinburgh Marathon on the 29th of May to raise money for their cause, and most importantly to celebrate the memory of my best friend. I never dreamed that I would run a marathon, but I know Josh would have pushed me towards fulfilling my dream and I know he'll be running every step of the way alongside me on the day.Any donation you can make would be greatly appreciated! :)Read more

title: crystels fundraiser to build a fence
Description: Hi, my name is Crystel Denton and I am the Founder/President of Ranger's Legacy Equine Rescue. We rescue, rehabilitate, and rehome abandoned, abused, neglected, and starved horses in New Mexico and Surrounding states.Can you help us? Before we moved our facility to our Roswell, NM property, our new next door neighbor had removed the majority of our perimeter fencing on our 49 acres. Some of his property butts up to ours so when he puts cattle in this particular pasture, they have access to our property. He has hundreds of acres and several different pastures he can put them in. Last year, he sold them after a couple of months saying he would not be bringing them back until the drought was over. During that time, I asked him to please put our fence back up before bringing any more cattle in which he kept telling me was our responsibility. Cut to present time. He has, once again, put cattle on the property surrounding ours. We are spending hours and days fixing fence (my horse pens are hotwire because we cannot afford to put up other fencing) and filling water tanks. We are constantly pushing cattle and Hannah and I cannot leave our property together. One of us always has to be here. This is where YOU come in. We need your help.We need to build our perimeter fence back as soon as possible. I have spoken with an attorney and we can win a lawsuit against our neighbor, but it would cost us up to $50,000 and take some time. In the meantime, his cattle will continue to destroy our fences, drink our water, and over graze our land. My thought is this; if you are going to help us with the funds, then lets raise less and do more! We need you because we cannot do it alone!As much as I would like to make an example of the neighbor, our money and time is better spent building a new fence. We need to raise, at least, $12,000 to get a fencing company to come in and get the fencing done right and done quick. You can make this happen! You can help to ensure that the horses are safe, that we are safe, and we can get back to what we are really here for. Helping those horses that need us to give them a second chance. We are asking you to help us regain our property because we need you to be able to get it done right!Will you give a gift of $10 or $25 to start us on our way to reaching our goal? Thank you for considering joining us in our quest to get our property re-fenced to keep the neighbors' cattle out!#letsbuildafence#wecandoit#smallbusinessreliefRead more

title: olos birthday fund for tibet
Description: I'm turning 33 on January 28! To celebrate, I am raising some much-needed funds for an organization doing cutting-edge work for Tibet globally. Students for a Free Tibet (SFT), through non-violent direct action and grassroots organizing, campaigns for freedom and human rights for Tibetans inside Tibet. I think many of you already know, but lately, SFT has been ABSOLUTELY killing it! and that too all over the world. I want to specifically bring up 3 reasons why I am supporting this organization:1. The campaign to boycott the 2022 Beijing Olympics is in full swing at the moment, and SFT has played a leading role in this cross-movement initiative. In October, two young activists were arrested and detained in Greece for hanging the Tibetan flag and a Hong Kong banner at the Acropolis in Athens. One of them was an 18-year-old Tibetan-American named Tsela Zoksang. Then, a few days later, Tibetan-Canadian activist Chemi Lhamo was arrested and detained for disrupting the Olympic flame-righting ceremony. In the videos, you could hear her screaming over the speakers raising the plight of the Uyghurs in East Turkestan. Both Tsela and Chemi are SFT-trained. Simultaneously, worldwide, from New York City to France to India, SFT chapters and activists rose up in numbers to protest the Beijing Olympics and China's horrific human rights violations. SFT is STILL in full swing, heavily prepared to wage another round of campaigning. These efforts have ballooned the Tibetan cause on a global scale and have helped expose the Chinese government's crimes. The largest newspapers and channels worldwide have covered these direct actions, which ultimately led to diplomatic boycotts by numerous governments.2. In March last year, a local coalition of Tibetans, Uyghurs, Hongkongers, Taiwanese and Chinese successfully shut down the Chinese government's Confucius Institute at Tufts University. I was part of this campaign, and we protested for 13 straight weeks, lobbied local elected leaders, and executed a massive email campaign to make this happen. SFT was CRUCIAL in this cross-movement effort. They provided us with digital tools, on-the-ground work, and various resources. I can confidently say that without the help of SFT, this campaign would not have been successful.3. The Tibetan cause is at a critical stage. I know that for us to move the needle, we need young people on the frontlines leading us. We need to inspire young people to be changemakers and doers, and we need to inspire young people to walk the walk and not just talk. To me, no organization encourages young Tibetans and supporters to fight for Tibet more than SFT. And this inspiration travels through various loops. I am proud to see SFT's commitment to training the next generation through actions camps, national conferences, local workshops, online seminars, etc. SFT consistently brews up a powerful combination of passion and skills, two vital forces that serve as the foundation of our movement.No shots, no beers. Instead, I'll buy you a drink the next time I see you. I am asking for $33 or whatever you can afford to help me reach my birthday goal. Every dollar that you donate will go to these hard-hitting campaigns. Every dollar will help promote Tibet on an international scale. Thank you all!#freeTibet.Read more

title: OGETTII
Description: ለወገን ለወዳጅ ለማስታወስ ያህል ይቺን ጭሬያለሁ። #ልደቴን_ለትግራይ የምናደርግበት ቀን ከFeburary 1 እስከ 28 ማለትም እስከ ልዴቴ ቀን ድረስ ይሆናል። በዚህ የበጎነት platform ላይ የምትወዱኝ ልደቴን ቤቴ ብጠራችሁ መቼም እንድ ስላይስ ኬክ ይዛቹ መምጣታቹ አይቀርም ስለዚህ የቺን የፍቅራችሁን መግለጫ ለትግራይ ህፃናት እና እናቶች እንድታደርጉልኝ መሬት ላይ ነጠላዬን አንጥፌ እለምናችኋለው። በህይወቴ ላይ ይቺን ቀን እንዳይ ፍቃዱ ለሆነው መድሓኒአለም ክርስቶስ ምስጋና ይሁን:: እንደ ጠላት ሃሳብ ቢሆን ይቺን ቀን ለማየት ባልታደልን። ትግራይን ማሰብ የምንተወው ስንሞት ብቻ ነው። በህይወታችን ተማምለን ለወጣንለት አላማ እስከ መጨረሻው እንሄዳለን።መፀሓፍ ቅዱስ ሲናገር "በእግዚአብሔር ስም ለዘላለም እንሄዳለን" ይላል። ገቢው ለማገር ትግራይ የሴቶች ማህበርOGETTII HABBENNRead more

title: rapid tests for robust learning
Description: Lafayette Preparatory Academy (LPA) is a small, public charter school in St. Louis City that serves students in Kindergarten through 8th grade. During the ongoing pandemic, LPA has been a leader in the community through collaborative planning between an incredibly dedicated staff and engaged family base. The cooperative effort between home and school have resulted in ongoing support for students. Incredibly, LPA saw academic growth in both Reading and Science through the state-mandated MAP tests in the Spring of 2021 as well as growth on their annual Panorama survey (measuring social emotional learning). All of this through a year of hybrid learning, with approximately 40% of the student body learning virtually for the entire year. LPA has remained diligent in mitigation strategies to keep students safe and in school, including weekly COVID testing through a state-funded initiative. Creative problem-solving, coupled with incredible teamwork has resulted in fewer class quarantines and overall satisfaction from families and staff alike.  However, the new Omicron variant led to staff shortages and higher rates of student infection after winter break. Increased infections rates coupled with a testing shortage led to the difficult decision to move all students to virtual learning for the week of January 10th. COVID-19 rapid tests are experiencing a shortage right now. Though LPA is part of a grant-funded program which includes 160 tests every other week, the regular shipments stopped in December. To ensure LPA is able to resume in-person learning, while ensuring students are as safe as possible during this time, LPA purchased 360 tests from an independent company. The good news is that they have shipped! However, this expense was not anticipated in the general operating budget and without additional help, cuts will need to be made to the budget to accommodate this expense. Your donation, no matter how large or small will ensure students have access to adequate COVID testing  during this difficult time.  Schools should not have to decide between a student's health and their educational opportunities.  Any funds raised in excess of the requested amount will support the increased expenses LPA has sustained in ensuring students are outfitted with proper masks (an additional $2K-$3K expense so far) and to support our ongoing "Student Support Fund" which ensures students (and their families) in need have access to supplies, technology, food, and services. Thank you for your support.Read more

title: saving corporal crunch
Description: Neglected and abandoned in a small Virginia town, Corporal Crunch was left to die. He and another dog were seized by animal control. Unfortunately, his companion did not make it and crossed over the rainbow bridge. Corporal Crunch was emotionally and physically broken with his chance of a healthy life slipping away with each minute.Old Dominion Humane Society (ODHS) stepped in to help. Coordinating their efforts in the early morning darkness, ODHS volunteers launched The Rescue of Corporal Crunch!Corporal Crunch’s trip to the Vet confirmed the severity of his condition. The Vet said that it was the worst case they had seen in awhile! So that just means we need to fight harder, raise more funding, and work with the best veterinarians to Save Corporal Crunch!The first step is to save Corporal Crunch’s Eyes!! We anticipate expenses between $8K - $10K for all treatments...plus all of the unexpected pop-up expenses that always happen, so we have set the goal at $15,000. Once treatment is complete, all remaining donations will be used to support other ODHS dogs, to include critical veterinary treatment!There are (3) ways to donate:Venmo: @OldDominionHumaneSocietyPlease note: CrunchGo Fund Me Charity: https://gofund.me/b41c10dfDog Krazy Donation: https://dogkrazy.com/This can be online in the form of food, eye wipes, joint supplements, or gift cards. Just tell them that it is for ODHS Crunch!Thank you for taking the time to read this and for opening your heart to Corporal Crunch!!!!! Maybe with good behavior, we can get him promoted to Sgt Crunch! Semper Fidelis and Thank You!Read more

title: cauchemar au rve amricain
Description: Le 16 Novembre 2020, un appel bouleverse ma vie et brise mon rêve ! Un cardiologue m'impose l’arrêt immédiat du football sous peine d'une MORT SUBITE…Je m'appelle Anatole Levallois, j'ai 19 ans, originaire de Granville, dans la Manche en Normandie, je vais vous raconter mon histoire où plutôt comment je suis passé de futur joueur de football universitaire aux USA avec une bourse sportive à devoir arrêter le football du jour au lendemain pour RESTER EN VIE!D'un rêve idéaliste, c'est un objectif pour lequel je travaille dur depuis le collège en m'entrainant chaque jour avec mon club ou seul. Durant mes années lycée, je me lève chaque jour à 5h00 du matin pour m'entrainer, puis pars en cours à 7h jusqu'à 16h et enchaîne avec un entrainement en club ou une séance individuelle.A cette même période, je découvre l'opportunité qu’offrent les universités américaines qui recrutent des joueurs étrangers en leur finançant tout ou partie leurs années universitaires. Je suis à ce moment lucide sur mes capacités footballistiques. : j'ai des qualités mais je suis encore loin du niveau professionnel ou semi-professionnel permettant de vivre du football. Cependant, je suis persuadé et confiant sur ma capacité à travailler plus que les autres et à devenir meilleur sur le long terme.Immédiatement ce projet me séduit sachant que ces bourses sportives me permettraient de couvrir tout ou partiellement les coûts universitaires extrêmement élevés aux Etats-Unis. Je suis également conscient que percer dans ce milieu est difficile et qu’une blessure peut vite briser une carrière. Avoir un plan B tout en gardant un niveau de compétition élevé est donc parfait.Après de nombreux échanges avec mes parents qui me soutiennent dans mon projet, je m’investis à 100% afin de devenir étudiant/joueur de football dans une université américaine. Je me renseigne sur toutes les modalités nécessaires : visas, tests d’anglais obligatoires, … et commence à envoyer des emails à des coachs d'universités pour lesquelles je suis intéressé. En parallèle, à l'été 2019, j'intègre un club important de ma région, l'U.S. Avranches, afin de toujours jouer au meilleur niveau possible.En Septembre 2019, reprise du lycée avec la préparation du BAC, je passe le TOEFL et le SAT, deux examens en anglais obligatoires pour étudier en université aux Etats-Unis. D’un coût non négligeable, je les finance entièrement avec un job d’été et obtiens deux très bons résultats à chacun.D’octobre à janvier, j’entre en contact avec plus de 250 universités qui m’intéressent tant pour le niveau où évolue leur équipe de football que pour les opportunités d’études qu’elles offrent et j’envoie également environ 1000 emails aux différents coachs. Sur le volume, je reçois en retour un nombre important de propositions très intéressantes avec différents projets. Mon choix se base à chaque fois sur 3 critères principaux :·     Bourse : Financièrement abordable pour moi et mes parents·     Ambition : Projet sportif de l'équipe·     Etudes : Opportunités d’enseignements proposésAprès plus d'une cinquantaine d'appels avec différents coachs aux Etats-Unis, je choisi Pima Community College en mars 2020, une université, championne nationale de NJCAA en 2018. Elle propose un excellent projet sportif avec une réelle volonté de m'intégrer au coeur du projet et également académique avec tous les critères que je recherche.Fin mars 2020, le Covid-19 nous oblige au confinement avec différentes restrictions sanitaires : je poursuis ma préparation au Bac en ligne et la saison de football est stoppée net. Pour cette première saison passée à l'US Avranches, nous remportons le championnat de U18 Régional 1 en ayant la meilleure défense du championnat et nous accédons au meilleur niveau national des moins de 19 ans.Avec le confinement imposé, je mets tout en place pour arriver le plus affuté possible aux Etats-Unis et commence donc une préparation individuelle intensive. De mars à juillet, je m’impose 2 entrainements quotidiens avec en moyenne 20h d'entrainements par semaine. Cette période difficile par rapport aux conditions sanitaires est excellente pour moi grâce aux progrès que je réalise au fil des mois.Voici une courte vidéo qui résume ma préparation :Cependant, en juillet à 2 semaines de mon départ, j'apprends que notre saison est reportée à cause du Covid-19 et décale mon départ de 6 mois. Je décide alors de poursuivre cette préparation tout en commençant mon premier semestre en ligne.En novembre 2020, dans l’objectif d’améliorer encore mes performances, je décide de faire des tests médicaux. Et le 16 Novembre 2020, on m'annonce avoir découvert une hypertrophie artérielle et une dilatation de mon aorte ascendante, une anomalie pouvant provoquer une mort subite à effort intense.Plus qu’un choc, ce sont mes projets, mon ambition, mon avenir, … ma vie qui s'écroulent d’un seul coup ! Je ne peux pas y croire, je n’arrive pas à les croire. Je me pense qu’il s’agit d’une erreur mais des examens approfondis confirment le diagnostic.Les jours suivants sont extrêmement difficiles à vivre et la réalité tellement dure à accepter. Ce projet visualisé depuis tellement d’années s'écroule du jour au lendemain. Fini le sport, fini le football… J’étais perdu et n’avais plus d’avenir !L’opération a lieu en urgence le 22 décembre 2020 pendant les fêtes de fin d'années et j’apprends ensuite du chirurgien que mon aorte avait déjà commencé à se dégrader et que j'aurais dû mourir si un caillot de sang ne s’était pas formé pour l’éviter...Ainsi, devant partir en août 2020, sans le Covid-19 qui provoqua le blocage des frontières américaines puis le report du début des championnats de soccer, je n'aurais jamais fait cette échographie et je serais certainement décédé à l'entrainement ou pendant un match aux Etats-Unis : LE COVID-19 M’A DONC SAUVÉ LA VIE !Rentré chez moi, je passe 6 mois cloîtré et obtiens malgré tout la moyenne scolaire parfaite de 4.00 sur 4.00. Durant ces 6 mois, je suis toujours extrêmement bouleversé mais un objectif me permet de me motiver malgré tout : partir aux USA pour poursuivre mes études, rencontrer le coach avec lequel j’ai échangé durant plus d’un an et les joueurs avec lesquels j’aurais joué.Ne pouvant plus bénéficier de la bourse sportive, ma situation financière n’était plus la même … et les études universitaires aux Etats-Unis sont excessivement onéreuses. Ayant étudié en ligne toute la 1ère année, l’économie des voyages, du logement, de la nourriture et des frais additionnée à un prêt étudiant et l’aide de mes parents me permet financièrement de pouvoir envisager de partir sans aucune bourse d’étude.En raison de mon opération cardiaque, l'assurance prévue avec laquelle j'avais signé un contrat en juillet 2020 et aucune autre compagnie ne veulent prendre le risque de m'assurer. Je me trouve à nouveau dans l'obligation de mener une nouvelle bataille de 4 mois d'avril à juillet pour parvenir au final à être obligé de réaliser un montage improbable composé de 3 assurances différentes pour me permettre d'être couvert et de partir.Et enfin, début août 2021, plus d'un an après le départ initialement prévu, je m’envole pour les Etats-Unis.Je découvre alors un autre pays, une autre culture, une tout autre façon de vivre. Juste avant mon arrivée, l'entraineur principal de l'équipe de soccer de l'université me propose d'aider l'équipe en intégrant le staff en tant qu'entraineur adjoint, c'est une nouvelle vie qui commence.Je découvre alors un nouveau rôle dans le football; celui d'être sur le banc. Nous reprenons les entrainements plusieurs semaines avant le début du semestre de cours et j'affronte tout de suite une réalité extrêmement difficile : je ne joue plus et je ne pourrai plus jamais jouer !Après seulement le deuxième entrainement de l'équipe auquel j'assiste, je reviens dans mon appartement et fonds en larmes. Je me demande réellement ce que je fais là, pourquoi je suis venu aux Etats-Unis. La compétition, le dépassement de soi, le travail acharné n'est plus possible pour moi et je regarde maintenant tous les jours les joueurs de l’équipe faire ce que je veux faire.Malgré la difficulté psychologique provoqué par la situation, je prends de plus en plus de plaisir dans ce nouveau rôle de coach. Mon implication avec l'équipe et les responsabilités de plus en plus importantes que me confie le staff (création et la mise en place des exercices, animation des entrainements, échauffements d’avant match, travail tactique, analyses vidéos de nos matchs et celui de nos adversaires, …), je prends de plus en plus de plaisir...Cette 1ère saison, nous réalisons une phase de championnat avec 14 victoires de suite avant de perdre notre dernier match 1-0 mais sommes tout de même qualifiées au tournoi national. Nous partons en fin Novembre jouer ce tournoi national dans le Kansas et après un tournoi exceptionnel de l’équipe, nous le gagnons et devenons champions des Etats-Unis 2021 de NJCAA!Finalement, je raconte cette histoire car je suis premièrement fier de mon parcours et que rien n'est terminé dans la vie tant qu'on ne le décide pas. Tout peut s'arrêter du jour au lendemain, on peut tout perdre mais si ce n'est pas la vie, rien n'est fini et tout peut recommencer. Tant qu’il y a la vie, il y a de l’espoir et des projets à créer et à faire aboutir.Après avoir appris que je ne pourrais plus jamais faire du sport de compétition, j'étais dévasté. Il ne s’agissait pas simplement d’une passion pratiquée au quotidien mais un véritable projet de vie dans lequel je croyais et pour lequel je me levais chaque matin. Plus qu'un rêve, c'était un choix et un objectif. J'avais décidé de réussir dans le football !Au final, après avoir vécu cette expérience, aujourd'hui, je me sens plus fort mentalement. Chaque jour je me dis que je suis un survivant et que j'ai encore plus envie d’apprendre et d'entreprendre sur tous les projets qui me tiennent à cœur. J’ai encore plus envie parce je juge injuste ce qui s'est passé.Aujourd'hui, je suis déterminé plus que jamais à rebondir, à mener de nombreux projets et mettre tout en œuvre pour les faire aboutir.Avec la disparition de mes bourses d’étude, une difficulté est malgré tout présente : Comment financer les 50 000€ nécessaires à ma 3ème et 4ème année aux Etats-Unis et pouvoir continuer à entrainer ?Honnêtement, je ne sais pas ! Mais je sais une chose : je trouverai un moyen de financer ces études qui me permettent d'avancer après avoir souffert la plus grosse épreuve de ma vie! Avec ma très bonne moyenne académique de 3.87 sur 4.00, j’espère pouvoir bénéficier d'une bourse mais cette dernière ne couvrira qu’une toute petite partie du montant nécessaire. J’ai déjà fait un prêt étudiant et ne pourrais pas bénéficier d’une rallonge. Mes parents m’ont déjà beaucoup aidé et continueront mais ne pourront pas financer l’ensemble.L’objectif de cette cagnotte est donc de vous présenter mon histoire mais je ne souhaite pas faire l’aumône mais simplement vous présenter ce que j'ai vécu et vous propose d’en être un acteur car ce que vous venez de lire n’est que le début.C’est aujourd’hui l'idée que j’ai trouvé pour me permettre de construire un nouveau rêve, d’espérer pouvoir mettre en place mes nouveaux projets et d’atteindre mes nouveaux objectifs et tous ceux que je ne me suis pas encore fixés.Merci de m’avoir lu jusqu’au bout et votre soutien me va droit au cœur !Read more

title: schooling food education supplies in kano
Description: Ahmed is a social activist from Nigeria whose life experiences have been shaped by the crippling effects of poverty. After losing his parents to sicknesses made unavoidable by malnutrition and the poor quality of food, water and waste management in his community, Ahmed has been determined to improve the lives of those around him.The struggles Ahmed and his community face are huge. Life is made difficult by barriers like war, bandits, kidnapping, resource extraction, waste dumping, water pollution, and contagious diseases, to name a few. NGO’s promising to improve the lives of the most vulnerable are stifled by bureaucracy and corruption and benefits rarely actually make it to those who need it most.That’s why Ahmed began his own NGO to provide essential school materials to children in his community to help them be able to attend school. Ahmed knows that ensuring these children can access education is the best way to break the cycles of poverty, hunger and suffering which his community is beset by.Ahmed is currently in Scotland, where his NGO was sponsored to come and speak at COP26 and spread awareness about how those on the frontlines of climate change are affected by so many colliding factors from historical and current injustices. Whilst he is here, he is trying to get connected and raise funds for his NGO and needs as much support as he can to get funds back to his village.The number value we have come up with covers the costs of providing pencils, exercise books, school bags, shoes and breakfasts to two hundred children in Ahmed’s community for one year. Having these resources means that children which would not be able to attend school, or even have one meal per day, can have the opportunity to do so.Please give what you can, even the smallest amounts can mean that children can have daily access to desperately needed nutrition.NB: on the behalf of Ahmed (and with him physically), we created this fundraiser through my details in France (David Annic), as GoFundMe isn't currently operational in Nigeria. ALL FUNDS COLLECTED will be sent directly to Ahmed's Account in Kano through Western Union. Thanks for your understanding.Read more

title: aide Joe Brescia financer sa formation naturopathe
Description: Traduction plus bas en Anglais et Italien / English and Italian traduction below / Traduzione in Englese et Italiano di seguitoBonjour à toutes et tous,                     Je partage aujourd’hui avec vous les prémisses d’un projet qui m’anime intimement et dont les perspectives sont à la mesure d’un changement de cap. Ce projet naît des réflexions qu’ont suscitées en moi les épreuves que j’ai dû affronter ces dernières années. J’ai, entre autres, été confronté à la maladie, qui a profondément transformé mon rapport au monde. Je me suis dirigée vers des méthodes de soin douces et naturelles et les expériences bénéfiques que j’en ai alors retirées n’ont cessé d’éveiller mon intérêt. Je me suis passionnée pour plusieurs de ces approches comme pour le domaine de la santé et du bien-être en générale. Dans ce contexte, c’est avec enthousiasme que je formule aujourd’hui le souhait d’entreprendre une formation dont l’horizon professionnel est celui de naturopathe. L’école «Euronature» que je souhaite suivre, se trouve à Bordeaux, son coût est de 12000€ pour un an de formation à temps plein, en présence. Je ne peux cependant assurer l’intégralité du coût de la formation, les passages à vide de ces derniers temps ont eu un impact direct sur mes économies. Je me permets ainsi de solliciter votre aide et je vous en remercie d’avance. Je tiens à partager cette aventure avec vous et j’ai surtout hâte de vous en faire profiter. Je vous propose plusieurs options dont vous pourrez bénéficier selon le choix, dans l’immédiat, au cours de l’année ou au terme de ma formation.• Cartes Postales en papier ensemencé (Papier buvard dans lequel ont été introduit des graines « Herbes aromatiques ou Fleurs » que vous pourrez planter. (10€ Pièce et 27€ pour les trois). Passez commande dès maintenant, elles seront disponibles aux premiers jours de la nouvelle année.• Un bilan santé en Naturopathie … 1h30mn à 50€ (possible à distance)• Un soin en Réflexologie plantaire … 40mn à 30€ (dans la région de Bordeaux)• Un soin détente corps «Massage Thai» … 1h00 à 40 € (dans le courant de l’année)• Faire un don, dès à présent, de la somme que vous souhaitez …. €ATTENTION : Merci de mettre un commentaire afin que je connaisse le choix de votre participation.En plus de ces formules, je vous offre l’accès à mon blog « Natura soi » que j’alimenterai d’une base d’informations sur la santé au naturel et le bien-être, mais aussi de recettes et d’astuces.Dans ce blog, je témoignerai de l’évolution de ma formation. Si le cœur vous en dit … merci de vous rendre sur le lien suivant : joebrescia.wixsite.com/my-siteAmicalement,Joe Brescia06 83 14 09 44.................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................Traduction en Anglais / English translationHello All, Today, I am sharing with you the details of a project that greatly inspires me and signals a significant change of direction in my life. This results from the considerable hardships that I have had to face in recent years. Among other things, I was confronted with an illness which profoundly transformed my relationship with the World. I turned to gentle and natural methods of self-care, and the beneficial experiences I gained from them prompted in me a passion to study them further. As such, I wish to train as a ‘Naturopath’.The “Euronature” School, in Bordeaux, costs €12000 for one year, for full-time training, and attendance. Sadly, however, I cannot cover the full cost of it; my recent medical misfortunes, have had a direct, negative impact on my savings. I, therefore, seek your help and thank you in advance for any financial assistance you can afford me.I want to share of this adventure with you so that you may enjoy it too. I can immediately offer several options that will be of benefit, dependent on your preferences, either during the course of the year, or at the end of my training. These are as follows:·   Postcards in sown paper (Blotting Paper in which the seeds of “Aromatic Herbs or Flowers” ​​have been introduced for you to plant (10€ each or three for 27€). Place an order now, they will be available in the first days of the New Year.·   A health check in Naturopathy (1½ hours @ 50€ a session. It may be possible to conduct them remotely).·   A Foot Reflexology Treatment… 40 mins @ 30€ (in the Bordeaux Region only).·   A “Thai Massage” Body Relaxation Treatment (1 hour @ 40 €. This will be available during the course of the year).·   Or else, you can make a donation, now, of any amount you wish.ATTENTION: Please leave a comment so that I know of your participation, and choices.In addition to these formulae, I offer you access to my blog “Natura soi” which I will feed with a database of information on natural health and well-being, and also with recipes and tips. I will also report on the progress of my training.If you would like to support me, please go to the following link: joebrescia.wixsite.com/my-siteSincerely,Joe Brescia06 83 14 09 44.........................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................................Traduzione ItalianaCiao a tutti,Condivido oggi con voi le premesse di un progetto che mi ispira intimamente e le cui prospettive sono commisurate a un cambio di direzione. Questo progetto nasce dalle riflessioni che hanno suscitato in me le difficoltà che ho dovuto affrontare in questi anni. Tra l'altro mi sono confrontata con la malattia, che ha trasformato profondamente il mio rapporto con il mondo. Mi sono rivolto a metodi di cura delicati e naturali e le esperienze benefiche che ne ho ricavato non hanno mai smesso di suscitare il mio interesse. Ho una passione per molti di questi approcci per quanto riguarda il campo della salute e del benessere in generale. In questo contesto, è con entusiasmo che esprimo oggi il desiderio di intraprendere una formazione il cui orizzonte professionale è quello di naturopata. La scuola “Euronature” che voglio seguire è a Bordeaux, il suo costo è di 12000 euro per un anno di formazione a tempo pieno, in presenza. Tuttavia, non posso coprire l'intero costo della formazione, i crolli degli ultimi tempi hanno avuto un impatto diretto sui miei risparmi. Chiedo pertanto il vostro aiuto e vi ringrazio in anticipo. Voglio condividere questa avventura con voi e non vedo l'ora che vi piaccia. Offro diverse opzioni di cui puoi beneficiare a seconda della tua scelta, immediatamente, durante l'anno o al termine della mia formazione.• Cartoline in carta seminata (Carta assorbente in cui sono stati introdotti i semi “Erbe Aromatiche o Fiori” che puoi piantare. (10€ ciascuno e 27€ i tre). Ordina ora, saranno disponibili nel primi giorni del nuovo anno.• Un controllo sanitario in Naturopatia … 1h30mn a 50€ (possibile a distanza)• Un trattamento di riflessologia plantare… 40mn a 30€ (nella regione di Bordeaux)• Un trattamento relax corpo “Thai Massage” … 1h00 a 40€ (durante l'anno)• Fai una donazione, ora, dell'importo che desideri….€ATTENZIONE: Si prega di lasciare un commento in modo che io sappia la scelta della vostra partecipazione.Oltre a queste formule vi offro l'accesso al mio blog “Natura soi” che alimenterò con un database di informazioni sulla salute naturale e sul benessere, ma anche con ricette e consigli.In questo blog testimonierò l'evoluzione della mia formazione. Se ne hai voglia... vai al seguente link: joebrescia.wixsite.com/my-siteCordiali saluti,Joe Brescia06 83 14 09 44Read more

title: help building a new school for the kids in arusha
Description: Tanzania services and children support is a non-profit organization found in Arusha Tanzania dealing with providing free education to at-risk children with the aim of fighting poverty through education.In 2015, we created a new organization in Arusha. Our organization is focusing on supporting struggling children within our society by providing free education and social support. Our long-term goal is to reduce the amount of street children and poverty not only in our region, but throughout the entire country.As currently the school building consists of only one class which is very small and the conditions are not conducive for the children to learn. Over 30 children aged from 3 to 7 are under the care of the foundation. The construction of the new school has started but has been suspended due to a lack of funds. 3000€ is needed to complete it.The new school will be located to a place called new city a newly settled part of Arusha, and it consists of two classes with the division of younger and older children, toilets and a room for the teachers. The very important element of a new school is the green area which will allow the kids to go out into the fresh air during the break which is impossible in the current situation.We are looking for anyone willing to support our organization by donating anything  you've as we bealive that a little donation of yours is more worthy for us.Thank you!Read more

title: help us build a school in burkina faso
Description: (Version francaise en bas de page)We are building an innovative school complex and permaculture farm on 9 hectares of land in the town of Soumousso, in Burkina Faso. The school will eventually welcome 600 students from 3 to 20 years old, as well as the local adult population for literacy programs.Learn more about our project by following this link: https://www.lescolombesdufaso.org/en-brefThere is a huge need for investment in education in rural sub-Saharan Africa. And there is a global need to return, care and reforest the earth. Our project tackles all this and will change many lives. You can help us on this journey!Please support us by donating, sharing this campaign, or by contributing your time and skills. Thank you for your support!Phase 1 - 20,000 euros - administrative tasks, soil analysis, architectural & permaculture design, preparation of the land (water system, first phase of tree planting)Phase 2 - 280,000 euros - construction of the complex in Nubian vault (sustainable, affordable & traditional eco-construction method), reforestation of 1 hectare of land, planting of the gardensPhase 3 - 100,000 euros - preparation for opening. Hiring & training of the staff, equipment, communicationTotal: 400,000 eurosThis campaign is for Phase 1._______________________________________________________Nous lançons la construction d’un complexe scolaire innovant et d’une ferme en permaculture sur 9 hectares de terrain dans la commune de Soumousso, au Burkina Faso. L'école accueillera à terme 600 élèves de 3 à 20 ans, ainsi que des adultes de la localité pour des programmes d'alphabétisation.Découvrez notre projet en suivant ce lien : https://www.lescolombesdufaso.org/en-brefIl y a un énorme besoin d'investissement dans l'éducation en Afrique sub-saharienne. Dans la région de Soumousso, un enfant sur deux ne va pas à l'école, faute de place. De plus, les enjeux mondiaux du changement climatique nous engagent tous à prendre soin de la terre et de l’environnement. Notre projet s’engage également dans ce sens et contribuera à changer la vie de beaucoup de personnes. Vous pouvez contribuer également à cela en nous aidant dans cette mission!Veuillez nous soutenir en faisant un don, en partageant cette campagne ou en donnant de votre temps et vos compétences. Merci pour votre soutien!Calendrier de financement :Phase 1 - 20 000 euros -Démarches administratives, analyse du sol, conception architecturale et permaculturelle, préparation du terrain (système d'eau, première phase de plantation d'arbresPhase 2 - 280 000 euros - construction du complexe en voûte nubienne (méthode d'éco-construction durable, abordable et traditionnelle), reboisement de 1 hectare de terrain, plantation des jardins fruitier, potager et forestierPhase 3 - 100 000 euros - préparation à l'ouverture. Embauche & formation du personnel, équipement, communicationTotal : 400 000 eurosLa présente campagne concerne la Phase 1.Read more

title: l apprendre jouer bouger
Description: ﻿ LE CONCEPT : LÜ, la salle de sport interactive !Jouer, bouger, courir, rire : la base du développement physique et intellectuel de tout enfant. Plus les jeunes bougent, plus ils sont éveillés, curieux et développent leur soif d’apprendre.Mais comment les inciter à bouger et à se dépenser dans un monde de plus en plus tourné vers le numérique ? En transformant n'importe quel espace fermé en salle de sport interactive ! Bienvenue dans l’univers de Lü !Lü est un environnement spatial intelligent qui comprend et réagit aux comportements et aux interactions des joueurs en temps réel. Grâce à cette plateforme qui transforme un espace fermé en véritable salle de sport interactive, les participants arrivent à combiner jeux interactifs et activité physique. Lü transforme ainsi le lieu en espace d'apprentissage immersif pour éveiller les sens des enfants.Du gymnase classique à la salle de sport interactive ! 3 mots suffisent pour décrire cet outil !*** FUN : tout le monde s’entend pour dire que l’activité physique devrait être amusante et accessible à tous. Lü offre des expériences dynamiques et immersives où les joueurs développent leurs capacités physiques tout en jouant. Avec Lü, l’activité physique devient jeu.*** INGÉNIEUX : chaque aspect des activités pédagogiques de Lü a été conçu pour maximiser l’expérience dans le respect des capacités et des niveaux d’apprentissage de chacun.*** DYNAMIQUE :  je crois fermement à l’apprentissage par les jeux actifs et participatifs. En jouant avec Lü, les sens et les esprits sont pleinement sollicités, ce qui permet de mener les activités et les sports à un tout autre niveau. Lü offre donc une méthode d'apprentissage pluridisciplinaire et transversale.Le système Lü est donc une approche innovante, interactive et éducative de l’activité physique et sportiveen proposant des expériences dynamiques, immersives et inclusives ayant pour objectifs le développement des habiletés motrices et capacités cognitives des joueurs tout en gardant une dimension ludique et de plaisir.Bref, le LÜ c'est l'activité physique réinventée !PRÉSENTATION : Solutions SportPassionné de sports, éducateur sportif depuis près de 20 ans, salarié du milieu associatif sportif depuis de longues années, j'ai développé depuis 8 mois ma microentreprise : Solutions Sport.Des activités classiques (sports collectifs traditionnels, tir à l'arc, ... ) aux activités funs et innovantes (bumball, bouncer ball, kin ball, ultimate, ...), en passant par des activités inclusives (sarbacane, torball, ...), Solutions Sport a pour objectif , entre autre, de faire pratiquer une activité physique à un maximum de personnes :les enfants bien sûr (écoles, centres de loisirs, clubs, ...) mais aussi les personnes en situation de handicap (activités inclusives) ainsi les seniors (activités adaptées).Je souhaiterais, à l'heure où les jeunes pratiquent de moins en moins d’activité physique régulière, où la sédentarisation gagne du terrain et à l'heure du "tout connecté" mettre les nouvelles technologies au service des activités physiques et sportives !Le dispositif LÜ est particulièrement adapté à cette génération connectée friande de nouveautés et d’interactions.De plus , le LÜ est un outil mobile et adaptable qui facilite ainsi la mise en place de séances sportives de proximité. Il permettra donc à un public éloigné de la pratique sportive(personnes en situation de handicap et public senior) d'exercer une activité physique.A QUOI SERVIRA LA COLLECTE ?Bien sûr, cette aire de jeux interactive a un coût... et pas n'importe lequel !Si la somme finale n'est pas atteinte à la fin de la campagne, plus nous nous approcherons du montant total, plus je serai en capacité de faire appel à des fonds propres et/ou un prêt pour concrétiser cet ambitieux projet.DES PALIERS A ATTEINDRE Parce que la somme finale est conséquente mais que chaque don compte pour le projet et le développement de Solutions Sport, plusieurs paliers sont mis en place,afin de vous proposer des contreparties et vous remercier pour votre participation !Palier 1 : 8000 €Palier 2 : 15 000€Palier 3 : 25 000€Palier 4 : 35 000€LES CONTREPARTIESPour tous les souscripteurs à la campagne GoFundMe, un système de tirage au sort sera mis en place dès qu'un palier sera atteint !Si le palier 1 est atteint : tentez de gagner un Pack Nintendo Switch Ring Fit Adventure Edition Limitée d'une valeur de 329,99 €.Si le palier 2 est atteint : tentez de gagner une enceinte Bluetooth JBL Boombox2 d'une valeur de 549 €.Si le palier 3 est atteint : tentez de gagner une GoPro Hero 10 et ses accesoires d'une valeurs de 689 €.Si le palier 4 est atteint : tentez de gagner un Iphone 13 Pro 128Go d'une valeur de 1159 €.Pour les associations et collectivités souhaitant participer financièrement à cette campagne et si le projet se réalise, elles seront bien sûr prioritaires pour la mise en place de séances d'initiation LÜ , à tarif préférentiel, contactez-moi !Je compte sur votre soutien et sur votre mobilisation pour participer et relayer au maximum ce projet qui me tient à cœur et ainsi permettre le développement de cet outil le plus largement possible .Merci d'avance à tous !Thomas.Read more

title: help me finish my bachelor thesis
Description: English and German below!Français :Bonjour, Je suis Sarah-Julie une étudiante en communication visuelle. Je suis actuellement en train d'écrire ma thèse et j'en suis à ma quatrième année d'étude. N'ayant jamais eu d'énormes moyens financiers, et finançant moi-même mes études, j'ai décidé de partir étudier en Allemagne pour poursuivre mon rêve de devenir directrice artistique un jour. Ayant un bon niveau d'allemand et puisque là-bas il ne faut pas dépenser plus de 600€ par mois, ce qui était impossible à envisager pour moi.Depuis le décès de mon père cet été nous n'avons pas simplement eu du mal à remonter la pente psychologiquement mais aussi financièrement.Non seulement j'ai perdu mon job étudiant dès l'apparition de la pandémie de Covid et il est presque impossible d'en retrouver un, j'essaye de travailler sur des commandes en design graphique, mais là aussi, les clients se font rares.En effet, ma mère a pris soin de mon père pendant ces dernières années, ce qui lui a rendu impossible de travailler à côté.Entre les obsèques à payer, le notaire, les vétérinaires pour les maladies post-traumatiques de mon chien et l'inflation qui rend toute la vie plus cher nous nous retrouvons dans une situation très sérieuse.Mes études me tiennent énormément à cœur, surtout à quelques semaines seulement de la soutenance de ma thèse. Je ne peux pas décaler mes études encore plus et un diplôme me permettrait de chercher sérieusement du travail.Malheureusement je me vois presque devoir arrêter mes études si près du but car je n'ai plus les moyens de les financer. Entre les dettes, mon ordinateur qui s'est cassé et dont j'ai besoin en urgence, les trajets en train impayables (au moins 300€), l'impression de mon projet artistique et de ma thèse qui coûtera plusieurs centaines d'euros, et autre matériel pour la réaliser.À cela s'ajoutent les choses simples comme la nourriture, le loyer, le chauffage etc...Je serais extrêmement reconnaissante de toute aide et si vous n'avez pas les moyens, un partage aiderait déjà beaucoup.Je suis désespérée car mon rêve se brise devant moi, alors que j'avais presque réussi.Merci beaucoup!Deutsch :Hallo,Ich bin Sarah-Julie, eine Kommunikationsdesign Studentin. Zurzeit schreibe ich meine Abschlussarbeit und befinde mich im vierten Studienjahr. Da ich nie über enorme finanzielle Mittel verfügte und mein Studium selbst finanziert habe, entschloss ich mich, in Deutschland zu studieren, um meinen Traum zu verwirklichen, eines Tages Creative Director zu werden. Da ich gute Deutschkenntnissen habe und da man dort nicht 600 € im Monat ausgeben muss für eine Schule, was für mich unvorstellbar war.Seit dem Tod meines Vaters in diesem Sommer haben wir uns nicht nur psychisch, sondern auch finanziell schwer getan, wieder auf die Beine zu kommen.Ich habe nicht nur meinen Studentenjob verloren, als die Covid-Pandemie auftauchte, sondern jetzt ist es fast unmöglich, einen zu finden, ich versuche auch Aufträge im Grafikdesign zu machen, aber auch hier sind Kunden extrem selten.Tatsächlich hat sich meine Mutter in den letzten Jahren um meinen Vater gekümmert, was nebenbei einen Beruf für sie unmöglich machte.Zwischen der Beerdigung, dem Notar, den Tierärzten für die posttraumatischen Erkrankungen meines Hundes und der Inflation, die das Leben verteuert, befinden wir uns in einer sehr ernsten Situation.Mein Studium ist mir sehr wichtig, gerade einige Wochen vor der Abgabe. Ich kann mein Studium nicht noch weiter verschieben und ein Abschluss würde eine Arbeitssuche erfordern.Leider sehe ich mich fast schon so kurz vor Ende vor dem Abbruch meines Studiums, weil ich nicht mehr die Mittel habe, um es zu finanzieren. Zwischen den Schulden, meinem Computer, der kaputt gegangen ist und den ich dringend benötige, den unbezahlbaren Bahnfahrten (mindestens 300 €), dem Druck meines künstlerischen Projekts und meiner Bachelorarbeit, die mehrere hundert Euro kosten werden, und anderem Material für die Umsetzung.Dazu kommen die einfachen Dinge wie Essen, Miete, Heizen etc...Ich wäre für jede Hilfe sehr dankbar und wenn Sie es sich nicht leisten können, würde ein Teilen schon sehr helfen.Ich bin verzweifelt, weil mein Traum vor mir zerplatzt ist, als ich es fast geschafft hatte.Vielen Dank!English :Hello,I am Sarah-Julie a visual communication student. I am currently writing my thesis and I am in my fourth year of study. Never having had enormous financial means, and financing my studies myself, I decided to go study in Germany to pursue my dream of becoming an art director one day. Having a good level of German and since there you shouldn't spend 600 € per month to study (which is the case in France), which was impossible for me to imagine.Since the death of my father this summer we have not just struggled to go up the slope psychologically but also financially.Not only did I lose my student job as soon as the Covid pandemic appeared and it is almost impossible to find one now, I try to work on orders in graphic design, but here too, customers are extremely rare.Indeed, my mother took care of my father for the past few years, which made it impossible for her to work alongside.Between the funeral to pay, the notary, the vets for my dog's post-traumatic illnesses and the inflation which makes life more expensive, we find ourselves in a very serious situation.My studies are very important to me, especially just a few weeks before my thesis presentation. I cannot postpone my studies even further and having my diploma will make it possible for me to look for a serious job.Unfortunately, I almost see myself having to stop my studies so close to the end because I no longer have the means to finance them. Between the debts, my computer which broke and which I need urgently, the unpayable train journeys (at least 300 €), the printing of my artistic project and my thesis which will cost several hundred euros , and other material for the realization.To this are added the simple things like food, rent, heating costs etc ...I would be extremely grateful for any help and if you can't afford it a sharing would already help a lot.I am desperate because my dream is shattered in front of me, when I had almost succeeded.Thank you so much! Read more

title: aider anouk faire une formation musicale
Description: Bonjour, je m’appelle Anouk, je suis à l'initiative de cette campagne de financement.Je viens me présenter à vous en quelques mots et vous présenter mon projet.Depuis petite, j'ai toujours eu le goût du chant, mais c'est en posant le pied au brésil que j'ai trouvé ma voix. Je suis passionnée de culture populaire brésilienne, mes compositions sont principalement en portugais et français et j'aime l'idée de mélanger les sonorités et influences entres les territoires. Au brésil où j'ai vécu pendant 4 ans, j'ai réalisé des ateliers musicaux (expression musicale dans le cadre d'un projets pour les personnes sans domiciles fixes, ateliers de flûtes traversière brésilienne (Pifano), fait partie de plusieurs groupes en tant que flûtiste et chanteuse et participé à des projets d'enregistrements pour quelques artistes locaux.Aujourd'hui j'aimerais partager ma passion et j'ai la joie de pouvoir étudier afin de me former et d'accomplir ce désir de transmission. J'ai donc décidé en octobre de rentrer en formation au CFPM de Toulouse (Centre de formation professionnelle, de la musique), cette école me permettra d'approfondir mes connaissances théoriques et pratiques, de travailler la voix, la scène et la composition ainsi que des outils pédagogiques solides pour enseigner la musique.J'aimerais par la suite mettre en place des projets d'éveil musical, favoriser des échanges culturels entre enfants de France et du Brésil. Je souhaite donner des cours de chant dans une approche ludique et/ou professionalisante.
